casebody.data:
KEVIN TERRY v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 21825)

Lavery, C. J., and Spear and Dranginis, Js.

Submitted on briefs April 3 officially released May 14, 2002 Per Curiam.

A review of the record and briefs shows that the trial court did not abuse its discretion in denying certification. See Owens v. Commissioner of Correction, 63 Conn. App. 829, 830-31, 779 A.2d 165, cert. denied, 258 Conn. 905, 782 A.2d 138 (2001).

The appeal is dismissed.
